text: The Battle of Al Rahlayn was a battle fought in 1075 between the Qarmatians, favoured by Banu Amer, and the Uyunis, favoured by the Seljuks. In this battle, the military commander Abdullah ibn Ali al-Uyuni defeated the Qarmatians and entered the city of Al-Ahsa. This led to the collapse of the Qarmatian state. == References == Category:Battles of the Middle Ages Category:1075
title: Battle of Al Rahlayn
